com.axelor.studio.service.wkf

Class WkfService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.axelor.studio.service.wkf.WkfService

  • public class WkfService
extends java.lang.Object
    Service class handle workflow processing. It updated related models/views according to update in workflow. Also remove effects of workflow it some workflow deleted. Call node and transition service for further processing.
    Author:
    axelor

    • Method Detail

      • process

        public java.lang.String process(Wkf wkf)
        Method to process workflow. It call node and transition service for nodes and transitions linked with workflow.
        Parameters:
        wkf - Worklfow to process.
        Returns:
        Exception string if any issue in processing else null.

      • addWkfStatusView

        private void addWkfStatusView(ViewEditor viewEditor,
                    java.lang.Integer navSelect)
        Method add 'wkfStatus' field in ViewEditor linked with Workflow.
        Parameters:
        viewEditor - ViewEditor linked with workflow.
        navSelect - Selection of widget type for 'wkfStatus' field.

      • clearViewEditor

        public java.lang.String clearViewEditor(ViewEditor viewEditor)
        Method set 'clearWkf' boolean in ViewEditor. Also call methods to remove wkf related buttons, actions and status. Method call when related workflow deleted.
        Parameters:
        viewEditor - ViewEditor linked with deleted workflow.
        Returns:
        Error string if issue in setting boolean, else return null.

      • clearViewButtons

        public java.lang.String clearViewButtons(java.util.List<ViewButton> viewButtons,
                                java.lang.String actionNames,
                                java.util.List<java.lang.String> skipList)
        Method delete ViewButtons of deleted workflow.
        Parameters:
        viewButtons - List of ViewButton to remove.
        actionNames - Comma separated names of actions related with buttons.
        skipList - Buttons names to skip from deleting
        Returns:
        Comma separated names of actions related with button.

      • removeMetaActions

        public void removeMetaActions(java.lang.String actionNames)
        Remove MetaActions from comma separated names in string.
        Parameters:
        actionNames - Comma separated string of action names.

      • removeWkfStatus

        public void removeWkfStatus(ViewEditor viewEditor)
        Remove wkfStatus field from ViewEditor and delete MetaField tool.
        Parameters:
        viewEditor - ViewEditor having 'wkfStatus' field.

      • getUpdatedActions

        protected java.lang.String getUpdatedActions(java.lang.String actions,
                                 java.lang.String action,
                                 boolean save)
        It update comma separated string of action with new action.
        Parameters:
        actions - String of comma separated action names.
        action - Name of action to add in actions string.
        save - Boolean to check if needs to add 'save' in actions string.
        Returns:
        Updated actions with new action.

      • getViewButton

        protected ViewButton getViewButton(ViewEditor viewEditor,
                       java.lang.String buttonName)
        Method to find/create ViewButton by button name from ViewEditor.
        Parameters:
        viewEditor - ViewEditor to check for button.
        buttonName - Name of button to search.
        Returns:
        Button searched or created.

      • processWkfs

        public java.lang.String processWkfs()
        Method to find all edited workflow and process it. Also it clear all ViewEditors having 'clearWkf' boolean true.
        Returns:
        Result string in clearing views or processing workflow.
